config.buildCommand: cd client && echo 'Node version:' && node --version && echo 'Checking environment variables:' && printenv | grep VITE_ || echo 'No VITE_ variables found' && echo 'Starting vite build...' && vite build --logLevel verbose || echo 'Vite build failed with error' && echo 'Checking dist directory:' && ls -la dist || echo 'Dist not found after build'
